text_block_list.text:
For some reason, I'd been standing by myself for several minutes. 
Durandal had said she'd be right back, but where did she even go?
Thinking back on it, earlier this morning——

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
『Trainer-dono! I apologize for the sudden invitation but, 
today, would you accompany me to see this musical!?』

That was the message that Durandal had sent me a short while ago. 
As soon as I agreed, she appeared almost right away.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: I've arrived to escort you, my lord.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
I'm honored that you'd accompany me. 
Thank you. Please, leave everything to me today!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: Now, if it please you my lord. On to this rickshaw.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Yes. Since we have the day off, 
I was hoping you'd be able to enjoy the scenery.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Fret not, my lord. 
This Durandal will be sure to transport you safely and with haste!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: Ah, how could I forget!?

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
You must be thirsty, my lord. 
Worry not, I shall go buy something right away!

Before I could say I was fine, Durandal hurriedly ran off. 
Apparently she was really excited about today's outing.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
I apologize for making you wait, Trainer-dono. 
Water, coffee, tea, soft drinks. Just tell me which you'd prefer.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: Well, that is……because I ran off without taking your order.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
But rest assured! I purchased a little of 
everything in the store. You can choose freely!

And now our current situation. Durandal said she would check 
to make sure there was no danger, but then never returned.
choice_data_list: Did she run in to trouble?

text_block_list.text: (Bzzzz, bzzzz, bzzzz)

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: 『My lord, I am truly sorry!』

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
I proceeded ahead with the intention 
to check the area for safety, however——

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Today's tickets don't allow reentry. 
I apologize, but could I ask you to make your way to me?

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
My "King"! My lord, over here! 
For not being able to bring you here myself, I apologize.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
However, I believe the performance will be to your liking. 
A wonderful piece depicting the life of the Holy Knight, Roland.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Ah, I'm going to go buy a pamphlet! 
Please, feel free to head to your seat first!

She must have been really looking forward to this. She had been 
so restless since the morning, I couldn't help but smile. But——

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
Hey……did you hear that? 
That person is making their Uma Musume-chan call them 『King』.

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text:
No way……isn't that kinda wild? 
Treating their Uma Musume-chan like a servant?

I couldn't help but feel taken aback. 
A trainer's job was to protect and support their Uma Musume.

Having an Uma Musume act as my servant would be 
bad not only for me, but for Durandal's public image.
choice_data_list: (It might be better to make her stop)

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: My lord, I have returned. ……Is something the matter?

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
——Oh, sorry. Seems like the show is starting. 
Let's focus on the stage for now.

text_block_list.name: Holy Knight Roland
text_block_list.text:
My King, let this serve as proof of my loyalty! 
With this 『Holy Sword』 and the pride of a knight, 
I will surely bring victory for my King!

text_block_list.name: King Charlemagne
text_block_list.text:
That is what it means to by my knight. 
I will be relying on you, as our unparalleled force of arms!

I heard her let out a voice, probably unintentionally, 
and glanced towards her. Durandal, with her eyes sparkling, 
was watching the performance enthusiastically.

text_block_list.name: Holy Knight Roland
text_block_list.text:
……Kuu, what a sizeable military force. 
We're surrounded. However——

text_block_list.name: Holy Knight Roland
text_block_list.text:
With this 『Holy Sword』 there is nothing to fear! 
With a single blade, I will cut through!

I could practically hear her heart racing. 
With adoration in her eyes, she seemed to sit taller in her seat.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: Aah………… I really……

I was starting to feel a little remorseful. Her wish, this 
longing of hers, there was no way I could take that away from her.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: Take my hand, my lord. There is a step here.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Please leave security on our return journey to me. 
I will sweep away all obstacles in our path!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
——By the way. 
Before the play, it seemed like you wanted to say something?

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
……is that so? If you need anything, 
please don't hesitate to give me your orders

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
……I don't deserve such praise. 
I intend to continue my efforts on in to the future.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
I swear it once more, my lord. 
That I will become the best knight for you!

A bold declaration with a serious gaze. I wanted to be the 
one to protect her so that that gaze would never be clouded.
